mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn, TMP.* from( select c.cart_no as cartNo, c.cart_item_no as cartItemNo, c.users_id as usersId, c.cart_qty as cartQty, p.product_no as productNo, p.product_name as productName, p.product_detail as productDetail, p.product_price as productPrice, p.strength as strength, p.brand_no as brandNo, p.category_no as categoryNo, p.product_description_html as productDescriptionHtml, p.brand_name as brandName, p.top_note as topNote, p.middle_note as middleNote, p.base_note as baseNote, p.image_name as imageName, p.image_type as imageType, p.image_size as imageSize, p.image_url as imageUrl, v.volume_no as volumeNo, v.volume_ml as volumeMl, v.volume_stock as volumeStock from cart c left outer join product_detail_view p ON c.cart_item_no = p.product_no left outer join volume v ON p.product_no = v.product_no WHERE c.users_id = #{usersId} order by c.cart_no desc )TMP ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from cart where cart_item_no =#{cartItemNo} and users_id=#{usersId}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_qty =#{cartQty} where users_id=#{usersId} and cart_no=#{cartNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_no, cart_item_no, users_id, cart_qty) values(#{cartNo}, #{cartItemNo}, #{usersId}, #{cartQty})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where users_id=#{usersId} and cart_no = #{cartNo}
